# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.5.10] - 2025-10-19

### Added
- Standardized project structure with proper Python library conventions
- Added CHANGELOG.md for tracking version history
- Added CONTRIBUTING.md with contribution guidelines
- Added MANIFEST.in for proper package distribution
- Added py.typed marker for PEP 561 type checking compliance
- Enhanced pyproject.toml with proper classifiers and metadata
- Module-level docstrings for all modules

### Changed
- Relaxed Python version requirement from ~=3.11.9 to >=3.11,<4.0
- Updated all code formatting to follow PEP 8 standards
- Improved documentation consistency across all modules

### Fixed
- Code formatting issues across the codebase
- Missing docstrings in various modules

## [0.5.9] - Previous Release

See commit history for earlier changes.
